item.title: How to make a transaction with UTXOs of different wallets with Sparrow
item.description: Let’s suppose that Bob and Alice share a flat and want to buy a television worth 2 bitcoins, paying half each. To do so, Bob could send 1 bitcoin to Alice so that she pays for the TV, but since the network fees are quite high, they decide to create a joint transaction with two inputs, one from Alice and one from Bob. 💡 The practical examples in the post are made in testnet.
